welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tres Rios, Costa Rica! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city, known for its stunning natural landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Tres Rios has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves flights to and from other Central American countries.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guapiles Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rio Frio Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rio Frio Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
